public class Server extends Object

  • Method Details

    • waitForClients

      public void waitForClients(int numberOfOnlinePlayers) throws A2ANetworkException
      Iterates through players, waits for clients that will be added and adds them to a contact list.
      Parameters:
      numberOfOnlinePlayers - Number of player's the server will wait for.
      Throws:
      A2ANetworkException - Can't establish connection between a server and a client.

    • staticMessage

      public void staticMessage(HumanPlayer player, StaticMessage msg) throws A2AIOException, A2AMessageException
      Writes static message and waits for acknowledgement.
      Parameters:
      player - Endpoint
      msg - StaticMessage.
      Throws:
      A2AIOException - Can't write to object stream.
      A2AMessageException - Can't read and construct message (find type) for read object.
